room_title: Escape room "The Apartment" by Escape the Room Dallas in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: I was thoroughly disappointed by our group's experience in The Apartment.I had previously been to two different escape room places in the Dallas area. I enjoyed the puzzles, mental challenges and teamwork required to get through the rooms. I left each previous experience on an adrenaline high.The Apartment was a different experience comparatively. Rather than having puzzle clues throughout the room that could be discovered and solved, The ONLY clues in The Apartment were given one by one on a TV screen. Apart from these "clues", there were no apparent puzzles to solve. The clues were extremely obvious.The effect of the spoon-feeding of clues was that everyone was bunched together, walking through a linear series of mundane steps. There was no "ah ha!" moment, no adrenaline, and no shared excitement.$30/person was way too much to pay for this disappointing experience.

room_title: Escape room "The Apartment" by Escape the Room Dallas in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Great way to meet new people and challenge the mind at the same time. Staff was very friendly even after they had been there 10+ hours.Planning on returning real soon

room_title: Escape room "The Apartment" by Escape the Room Dallas in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: An incredible, immersive, and interactive experience better than any VR escape game out there! Had a blast with our bachelor party, and we lost by three seconds. Will definitely do again

room_title: Escape room "The Apartment" by Escape the Room Dallas in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: This place is awesome. Great staff, with an awesome sense of humor. The apartment room is a fun, rewarding challenge. Our guide was the best at giving hints and pushed us in the right direction without just giving us the answer. Go. Do it. Win or lose.
